title: Bacon Sausage and Kale Soup
ingredients: ['450g smoked sausage, such as Mattessons, sliced in half lengthways and chopped into 1.25cm slices', '2 potatoes, cut into 5mm slices', '125g chopped onion', '6 rashers streaky bacon', '1 1/2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '135g kale, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chicken stock granules', '1 litre water', '75ml whipping cream']
